seller_description: Thewireless microphone  delivers crystal-clear audio  with Smartlink technology, which intelligently filters out noise for improved sound clarity. Enjoy hassle-free setup with automatic pairing, allowing quick and easy use. It boasts high-performance 2.4G wireless transmission, ensuring seamless audio delivery. Type C fast charging provides efficient power replenishment for long-lasting use. With 360° sound capture, this microphone offers immersive, ultra-clear audio. It also supports external wired microphones, giving you greater versatility. The extended wireless range of up to 100 meters lets you move freely while recording.
review: I purchased a wireless microphone and unfortunately, my experience has been plagued with issues. After just a few uses, both transmitters began experiencing charging problems. Based on my experience, I strongly advise against purchasing this wireless microphone. The lack of reliable charging make it a frustrating and unreliable product
